About Me

Biography

I'm a Network Engineer & Front-end Web Developer. I finished masters in telecommunications and computer networks and started learning programming for fun, i thought it's interesting building new projects and gaining new skills to build more complicated ones. I'm always encouraged to learn new technologies and to face bigger challenges, i'm sociable and i easily adapt to new conditions and environments.
